mapper.sql: eno, dno, jno, ename, esex, ebirthday, eid, eedu, hireday, jobstarday, estate, etype, efrom
mapper.select: select from t_emp where ename like concat('%',#{ename},'%')
select eno, e.dno, jno, ename, esex, ebirthday, eid, eedu, hireday, jobstarday, estate, etype, efrom from t_emp e LEFT JOIN t_dept d on e.dno=d.dno where d.dname= #{dname};
mapper.insert:
insert into t_emp
eno,
dno,
jno,
ename,
esex,
ebirthday,
eid,
eedu,
hireday,
jobstarday,
estate,
etype,
efrom,
#{eno,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{dno,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{jno,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{ename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{esex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ebirthday,jdbcType=DATE},
#{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{eedu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{hireday,jdbcType=DATE},
#{jobstarday,jdbcType=DATE},
#{estate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{etype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{efrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update t_emp
dno = #{dno,jdbcType=INTEGER},
jno = #{jno,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ename = #{ename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
esex = #{esex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ebirthday = #{ebirthday,jdbcType=DATE},
eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eedu = #{eedu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hireday = #{hireday,jdbcType=DATE},
jobstarday = #{jobstarday,jdbcType=DATE},
estate = #{estate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
etype = #{etype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
efrom = #{efrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where eno = #{eno,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_emp set dno = #{dno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, jno = #{jno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ename = #{ename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, esex = #{esex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ebirthday = #{ebirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eedu = #{eedu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hireday = #{hireday,jdbcType=DATE}, jobstarday = #{jobstarday,jdbcType=DATE}, estate = #{estate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, etype = #{etype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, efrom = #{efrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where eno = #{eno,jdbcType=INTEGER}
